articles.author: Stacy Liberatore
articles.title: First-ever live stream of Mars is set for TOMORROW - Daily Mail
articles.description: Earth is set to see the first-ever live images of Mars on Friday. The The European Space Agency will shoot never-before-seen views of the Martian world using its Mars Express orbiter.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency (ESA) is hosting the first-ever live stream of Mars that should reveal never-before-seen stunning details of the Red Planet.
The agency's Mars Express orbiter will share ne… [+4496 chars]
